content.question: Which of the following is the prevailing interpretation of the Mblo masks of the Baule people in West Africa?

choices.label: Their presence made it possible for the invisible world to affect the human world.
Their primary function was to allow ordinary people to glimpse the world of spirits.
They were commissioned by rulers to make sure that the rulers would be remembered.
They were danced to resolve conflicts between people by drawing on supernatural forces.

content.answer: Their presence made it possible for the invisible world to affect the human world.

topic.text: 6.3: Theories and Interpretations of African Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
